title: Jeremy Bowen on reporting from Ukraine's frontline
description: We hear from the BBC’s international editor about the difficulties of reporting from the frontline.

title: Midterms: The conspiracy theorists who want to to control elections
description: Candidates who falsely believe the last US election was stolen could be in charge in 2024.

title: Midterms turnout: Could Australia-style voting help in US?
description: Turnout in US elections falls below other countries. We look 10,000 miles away for a possible solution.

title: Cost of living: Second-hand shopping in vogue as prices rise
description: Attitudes towards pre-owned goods are changing and sustainability advocates welcome the shift.

title: World Cup 2022: Fifa tells all competing nations to 'focus on football' in Qatar
description: Fifa writes to all 32 teams competing at the World Cup to tell them the time has come to "focus on the football".

title: Gymnastics World Championships 2022: Jessica Gadirova wins bronze for GB's first all-around medal
description: Jessica Gadirova finishes third in the women's all-around final to become the first British gymnast to win a medal in the event at the World Championships.

title: Arsenal 1-0 Zurich: Hosts secure their place in the last 16 of Europa League
description: Arsenal secure their place in the last 16 of the Europa League with a narrow victory over Zurich at Emirates Stadium.

title: Rugby League World Cup: England start wheelchair tournament with victory over Australia
description: England get their Wheelchair Rugby League World Cup off to a winning start with a 38-8 win over Australia.

title: French parliament stopped over 'racist' remark

title: Israel elections: Outgoing PM Lapid congratulates Netanyahu on victory
description: Final results confirm a dramatic comeback for the former prime minister, backed by the far right.

title: Manchester Arena attack: Key failings of emergency response

title: Real Sociedad 0-1 Man Utd: Teenager Alejandro Garnacho scores but Red Devils finish second in Europa League group
description: Teenager Alejandro Garnacho scores an outstanding goal as Manchester United beat Real Sociedad but have to settle for second place in Europa League Group E.

title: England v Argentina: Billy Vunipola savouring international 'rebirth'
description: Billy Vunipola is savouring his return to international rugby after fearing his England career may have been over.

title: Will people sign up for Netflix's cheaper ad service?

title: Queen silhouette on Christmas stamps for last time

title: MP Jess Phillips praises Brummie accent

title: Stormzy heads programme to 'affect change' and address 'lack of diversity off the football pitch'

title: Is it right to raise interest rates in a recession?

title: Manchester Arena bombing: Saffie Roussos was badly let down, say parents

description: The talks with Mauritius will include the return of islanders expelled to make way for a military base.
